synthesis_conditions.procedure: K­[Cr­(L^N3O2Ph)­(CN)2] dissolved in MeOH was slowly added to a solution of [Fe­(H2L^N3O2NH2)­Cl2] in MeOH and H2O. The mixture was stirred overnight at room temperature.
synthesis_conditions.crystallization_method: Slow interdiffusion in a Schlenk tube of MeOH solutions of [Fe­(H2L^N3O2NH2)­Cl2] and K­[Cr­(L^N3O2Ph)­(CN)2].
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Washed with MeOH followed by Et2O

characterization.details: Elemental analysis (%) calcd. for C65.5H74Cr2FeN21O12: C 52.19; H 4.95; N 19.51; found: C 52.65; H 4.46; N 19.72

synthesis_conditions.procedure: K­[Cr­(L^N3O2Ph)­(CN)2] in MeOH was added dropwise to a solution of [Fe­(H2L^N3O2NH2)­Cl2] and NH4PF6 in MeOH and H2O. The mixture was stirred overnight at room temperature.
synthesis_conditions.crystallization_method: A solution of [Fe­(H2L^N3O2NH2)­Cl2] and NH4PF6 in MeOH and H2O was placed in a Schlenk tube and layered with MeOH. A solution of [Cr­(L^N3O2Ph)­(CN)2]K in MeOH was added on top.
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Washed with MeOH followed by Et2O

characterization.details: Elemental analysis (%) calcd. for C36H36.5CrF6FeN14O5.25P: C 43.14; H 3.67; N 19.57; found: C 43.26; H 3.73; N 19.65
